items.content_html: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.
items.title: AbdulmalekAlshugaa/netly-rn-expo: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.

items.content_html: A lightweight webpage that displays the current time and date in both 12-hour and 24-hour formats. Users can easily toggle between the two formats for a personalized experience. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it's perfect for those who want a simple, responsive, and customizable time display.
items.title: Saidurga13/current-date-time: A lightweight webpage that displays the current time and date in both 12-hour and 24-hour formats. Users can easily toggle between the two formats for a personalized experience. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it's perfect for those who want a simple, responsive, and customizable time display.

items.content_html: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory.
items.title: zacheryvaughn/network-volume-manager: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory.

items.content_html: React Carousel is a fully customizable and lightweight carousel component built for React applications. It provides smooth transitions, autoplay, infinite scrolling, and navigation controls, making it easy to integrate into any project.
items.title: saadqadir0786/react-carousel-package: React Carousel is a fully customizable and lightweight carousel component built for React applications. It provides smooth transitions, autoplay, infinite scrolling, and navigation controls, making it easy to integrate into any project.

items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable toast notification library for React Native. Effortlessly display non-intrusive toast messages for alerts, errors, successes, and more with smooth animations and flexible styling options.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript widget for integrating Atai chatbot into any website using an iframe. This script creates a floating chatbot button that toggles a chatbot window, ensuring seamless embedding and a smooth user experience.
items.title: VivekBhawsar18/chatbot-widget-integration: A lightweight JavaScript widget for integrating Atai chatbot into any website using an iframe. This script creates a floating chatbot button that toggles a chatbot window, ensuring seamless embedding and a smooth user experience.
